name: Momo's Quest
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/DKyWfMWifFwBJLNU8

There is an evil professor named Dr. Crypt. He is planning to destroy the city of AuZuer and changing all the citizens into zombies as his slaves. With the help of Mohammad Mohseen (Momo) as his assistant, they successfully accomplished their plan. But, it’s not the plan that Momo agreed with. The city becomes chaotic and Momo’s loved ones were becoming one of Dr. Crypt’s evil plan. Momo were so mad towards Dr. Crypt and he is trying to stop the evil plan. In order to save his kind, he must fight Dr. Crypt and get the antidote from him.
